comments:
Description:
Report element can't be deleted

Steps to reproduce:
1.Open the attached design file
2.Delete the table/parameters/dataset/datasource

Expected result:
The element can be deleted

Actual result:
They can't be deleted

The deleted items contain user properties that can't found, model throw the exception. Exception stacktrace is :

org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.command.UserPropertyException: The user property "Report1" can not be found.
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.command.UserPropertyCommand.dropUserProperty(UserPropertyCommand.java:119)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.command.ContentCommand.dropUserProperties(ContentCommand.java:602)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.command.ContentCommand.doDelectAction(ContentCommand.java:1132)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.command.ContentCommand.doRemove(ContentCommand.java:421)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.command.ContentCommand.remove(ContentCommand.java:353)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.DesignElementHandle.drop(DesignElementHandle.java:1187)

traces.message: The user property "Report1" can not be found.
